page.title: 12 CLUBS
page.content: IN SLEAFORD THERE ARE QUITE A FEW CLUBS.THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB IN THE WHITE HART MEWS WHICH IS RUN BY CATHOLICS,YOU HAVE TO PAY 15p TO GET IN. THERE IS ANOTHER YOUTH CLUB NEAR ST.GEORGES SCHOOL BUT THAT IS FOR OLDER PEOPLE (15 TO 20) THERE ARE 7 PUBS IN SLEAFORD,MOST OF THESE HAVE DISCOS AND CABARETS FOR ADULTS.THERE IS ALSO A LEGIONNAIRES CLUB, THIS IS FOR ADULTS,BUT CHILDREN CAN GO AT TIMES.FOR THIS YOU HAVE TO PAY A MEMBERSHIP FEE. THE SWIMMMING POOL HAS ALSO GOT A CLUB EVERY WEDNESDAY EVENING,CHILDREN RANGING FORM 5 TO 20 CAN GO. SLEAFORD ALSO HAS A SQUASH CLUB,A TENNIS CLUB AND A CRICKET CLUB. { { BY ANGELE BILBIE AGE(13)} { { }
